name: Farfalle Pasta with Artichoke Hearts
author: Chairman James
summary: Lacking a food processor I had to find another way to do this idea which called for an artichoke pesto. My version came out as good or better. This is a great meatless dish hot or cold.
ingredients: 2 (6.5 ounce) jars marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook the farfalle pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, until cooked through yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes; drain and set aside
Mix artichoke hearts, walnuts, Parmesan cheese, olive oil, lemon juice, basil, and oregano in a large bowl
Season with salt and black pepper
Add farfalle and stir to coat
